name: Slither Worm Snake - Switch Eat Color Coin Dotz
name_original: Slither Worm Snake - Switch Eat Color Coin Dotz
description:
You born as a small worm, and try to get bigger with eating others who are doing the same

Use your creep skills and try to survive

Just be on your way. DON’T get frustrated

Tap to jump all the way long through this typical wormy levels

Dodge the obstacles and create your highest score
